name: Colin Z. Allred
content: This story shows the real issues in our health care system and how Texas' refusal to expand Medicaid only made it worse. The #BuildBackBetter Act works to fix this, by helping expand access to nearly 1 million Texans who can't get access to Medicaid. dallasnews.com/business/healt‚Ä¶

name: Debbie Dingell
content:
Millions of seniors and people with disabilities spend more than $6,000/yr on prescription drugs.

With the #BuildBackBetter Act we will finally lower out-of-pocket prescription drug costs for seniors by ensuring they never pay more than $2,000/yr for drugs under Medicare Pt D.
text: millions seniors people disabilities spend 6000yr prescription drugswith buildbackbetter act finally lower outofpocket prescription drug costs seniors ensuring never pay 2000yr drugs medicare pt

name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
content: The #BuildBackBetter Act allows more seniors and individuals with disabilities to receive the services they need in their homes. It also strengthens the direct care workforce by improving provider payment rates and giving states resources to improve their care infrastructure. https://t.co/9FuZpA50Xx
text: buildbackbetter act allows seniors individuals disabilities receive services need homes also strengthens direct care workforce improving provider payment rates giving states resources improve care infrastructure

name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
content: Drug companies are not going to provide relief to consumers on their own, even during #COVID19. The #BuildBackBetter Act empowers Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices directly with companies. https://t.co/DoaRI0b5oN
text: drug companies going provide relief consumers even covid19 buildbackbetter act empowers medicare negotiate lower drug prices directly companies
